mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_ID, CONTENT_ID, BODY, USER_EMAIL, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE) VALUES(REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{contentId}, #{body}, #{userEmail}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET BODY = #{body}, UPDATED_DATE = sysdate WHERE REPLY_ID = #{replyId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(REPLY_ID) FROM REPLY WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
